full_text:
Page 1791
Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
From Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
To [b(6); b(7)(C)]
Date 2019/07/28 08:57
Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Can you not just move him to another cell? He will not have lunch in Attorney Conference. He will go back to his cell to eat. He knows this.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov
Date: 7/28/19 8:52 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov
Cc: [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov
Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
>> [b(6); b(7)(C)] 07/28/2019 08:52 >>
He also complained that he is in Attorney Conference from about 8 AM to about 8 PM each day and he said yesterday he only received one meal, a sandwich at about 4:15 PM. He said he should be getting lunch and dinner.
Also additional information on the toilet that reportedly flushed for 45 minutes. He stated to avoid the toilet from doing that again because he stated he found it so aversive and disorienting, he has been urinating in a cup. I already sent an e-mail to [b(6); b(7)(C)] about the toilet.
>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov> 7/28/2019 7:51 AM >>>
Good morning,
Thank you.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov
Date: 7/28/19 7:49 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov
Cc: [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov
Subject: Fwd: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
>> [b(6); b(7)(C)] 7/28/2019 7:49 >>
Page 9532
DOJ-OGR-00025808

text_blocks.content: Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
Can you not just move him to another cell? He will not have lunch in Attorney Conference. He will go back to his cell to eat. He knows this.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update

He also complained that he is in Attorney Conference from about 8 AM to about 8 PM each day and he said yesterday he only received one meal, a sandwich at about 4:15 PM. He said he should be getting lunch and dinner.

Also additional information on the toilet that reportedly flushed for 45 minutes. He stated to avoid the toilet from doing that again because he stated he found it so aversive and disorienting, he has been urinating in a cup. I already sent an e-mail to [b(6); b(7)(C)] about the toilet.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
Subject: Fwd: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing a prisoner's conditions, including their placement on suicide watch and issues with their cell's toilet. The email contains redactions of personal information.
